languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, у меня дурные вести. Между кланами, обслуживающими массивы пустотных щитов, вспыхнула вражда. По слухам, на нижних палубах видели Леди Теодору, и одно из семейств призвало поднять бунт против узурпатора корабля — то есть вас. Пока их безумным россказням никто не верит, но на границах отсеков начались волнения. Блюстители готовы устранить клан-зачинщика или приструнить всю команду пустотных щитов — решение за вами".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, корабль полнится дурными вестями. Между династиями, обслуживающими массивы пустотных щитов, вспыхнула вражда. По слухам, на нижних палубах видели леди фон Валанциус, и одно из семейств призвало поднять бунт против узурпатора корабля — то есть вас. Пока их безумным россказням никто не верит, но на границах отсеков начались волнения. Служба безопасности готова устранить семейство-зачинщика или приструнить всю команду пустотных щитов — решение за вами".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, у меня дурные вести. Между кланами, обслуживающими массивы пустотных щитов, вспыхнула вражда. По слухам, на нижних палубах видели Леди Теодору, и одно из семейств призвало поднять бунт против узурпатора корабля — то есть вас. Пока их безумным россказням никто не верит, но на границах отсеков начались волнения. Блюстители готовы устранить клан-зачинщика или приструнить всю команду пустотных щитов — решение за вами".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud broke out between the clans maintaining the void shield arrays. Rumor has it that late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun on the merge line of the compartments. Enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigator clan or reign in the entire void shield array's crew — the decision is yours."

Enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigator clan or reign in the entire void shield array's crew — the decision is yours."

So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's guards are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

"Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's guards are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

"Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我带来了可怕的消息。负责维护虚空护盾阵列的氏族之间爆发了争斗。有传言说，已故的西奥多拉夫人在下层甲板上出现了，于是其中某个家族呼吁所有人反抗篡夺了舰长之位的人，也就是您。尽管到目前为止，并没有人相信他们这种疯狂的说法，但船舱的边缘地带已经发生了动乱。船上的执法者已经做好了准备，他们可以随时消灭煽动叛乱的氏族，也可以对虚空护盾阵列区域的全体船员进行镇压。这件事情的决定权在您手上。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我带来了可怕的消息。负责维护虚空护盾阵列的氏族之间爆发了争斗。有传言说，已故的西奥多拉夫人在下层甲板上出现了，于是其中某个家族呼吁所有人反抗篡夺了舰长之位的人，也就是您。尽管到目前为止，并没有人相信他们这种疯狂的说法，但船舱的边缘地带已经发生了动乱。船上的镇压者已经做好了准备，他们可以随时消灭煽动叛乱的氏族，也可以对虚空护盾阵列区域的全体船员进行镇压。这件事情的决定权在您手上。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, traigo graves noticias. Se ha producido un enfrentamiento entre los clanes que mantienen los escudos de vacío. Según los rumores, alguien vio a la difunta lady Theodora en las cubiertas inferiores y una de las familias llama a la rebelión contra {mf|el|la} usupador{mf||a}, es decir, contra usted. Por ahora nadie se cree estas locuras, pero empieza a haber malestar en los extremos de los compartimentos. El personal de seguridad está listo para eliminar al clan instigador o pacificar a la tripulación de escudos de vacío al completo. Usted decide».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, traigo graves noticias. Se ha producido un enfrentamiento entre los clanes que mantienen los escudos de vacío. Según los rumores, alguien vio a la difunta lady Theodora en las cubiertas inferiores y una de las familias llama a la rebelión contra {mf|el|la} usupador{mf||a}, es decir, contra usted. Por ahora nadie se cree estas locuras, pero empieza a haber malestar en los extremos de los compartimentos. El personal de seguridad está listo para eliminar al clan instigador o pacificar a la tripulación de escudos de vacío al completo. Usted decide».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich bringe schlimme Nachrichten. Es ist eine Fehde zwischen den Clans ausgebrochen, die für die Instandhaltung der Leerenschilde verantwortlich sind. Gerüchten zufolge wurde die verstorbene Lady Theodora auf den unteren Decks gesehen. Also rief eine der Familien zu einer Rebellion gegen den Usurpator des Raumschiffs auf ... also gegen Euch. Bislang glaubt niemand ihre verrückten Geschichten, aber an den Rändern der Abteilungen ist Unruhe ausgebrochen. Die Enforcer des Schiffes sind bereit, den aufrührerischen Clan zu eliminieren oder die gesamte Crew des Raumschiffs ruhig zu stellen ... die Entscheidung liegt bei Euch."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

languages.text: « J'ai de mauvaises nouvelles, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Une querelle a éclaté entre les clans qui entretiennent les infrastructures du bouclier Void. Des rumeurs affirment que feu dame Théodora aurait été aperçue sur les ponts inférieurs. L'une des familles appelle donc à la rébellion contre l'{mf|usurpateur|usurpatrice} du croiseur stellaire... vous-même. Jusqu'ici, personne n'a cru à leurs histoires délirantes, mais l'agitation gagne la périphérie des compartiments. Les prévôts du vaisseau sont prêts à éliminer le clan à l'origine de ces troubles ou à pacifier toute l'équipe du bouclier Void. À vous d'en décider. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

Les prévôts du vaisseau sont prêts à éliminer le clan à l'origine de ces troubles ou à pacifier toute l'équipe du bouclier Void. À vous d'en décider. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、急を要するお知らせです。ヴォイドシールド・アレイを管理する一族の間で争いが起きました。噂では、亡きシオドーラ様が下層デッキで目撃されて、一族のひとつがヴォイドシップを奪った者への反乱を呼びかけました…つまり、あなたに対する反乱です。今現在、その狂気じみた話を信じる者はいませんが、区画の周辺では動揺が広がりつつあります。船のエンフォーサーは、扇動する一族を排除するか、ヴォイドシールドのクルー全体を制圧する準備ができています。決めるのは陛下です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、急を要するお知らせです。ヴォイドシールド・アレイを管理する一族の間で争いが起きました。噂では、亡きシオドーラ様が下層デッキで目撃されて、一族のひとつがヴォイドシップを奪った者への反乱を呼びかけました…つまり、あなたに対する反乱です。今現在、その狂気じみた話を信じる者はいませんが、区画の周辺では動揺が広がりつつあります。船のエンフォーサーは、扇動する一族を排除するか、ヴォイドシールドのクルー全体を制圧する準備ができています。決めるのは陛下です」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kötü haberlerle karşınızdayım. Uçsuz kalkan dizilimlerinin bakımını yapan klanlar arasında bir ihtilaf çıktı. Söylenene göre merhum Leydi Theodora, alt güvertelerde görülmüş. Ailelerden biri de uçsuz gemisini gasbedene, yani size karşı isyan başlattı. Şu ana dek kimse deli saçması hikâyelerine inanmıyor ancak kompartımanların ücra kısımlarında huzursuzluklar başladı. Geminin infazcıları, kışkırtıcı klanı elemine etmeye veya uçsuz kalkanı mürettebatını komple pasifize etmeye hazır. Karar sizin."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I bring dire news. A feud has broken out between the clans that maintain the void shield arrays. Rumour has it that the late Lady Theodora was seen on the lower decks, and so one of the families called for a rebellion against the usurper of the voidship — that is, you. So far, no one believes their mad tales, but unrest has begun at the fringes of the compartments. The ship's enforcers are ready to eliminate the instigating clan or pacify the entire void shield crew — the decision is yours."
